FuncDef:
The anti-attack abnormal enable command enables defense against malformed packet attacks.
The anti-attack abnormal disable command disables defense against malformed packet attacks.
The undo anti-attack abnormal enable command disables defense against malformed packet attacks. The anti-attack abnormal enable command enables defense against malformed packet attacks. The anti-attack abnormal disable command disables defense against malformed packet attacks. The undo anti-attack abnormal enable command disables defense against malformed packet attacks. By default, defense against malformed packets is enabled.
